message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's fair and we both get a good share.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a fair deal.
Bob, since you wanted a bit more last time, I'm offering 55-45 now. It's a compromise from my initial fair split, considering your previous proposal.
I appreciate the compromise, but I still think I can get a bit more. 58-42 is my new offer.
Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'm offering 52-48 now. It's closer to your last proposal but still keeps things reasonable for both of us.
I see we're getting closer. I'll try 56-44 this time, hoping we can settle soon.
Bob, let's go back to the original fair split of 50-50. We're running out of time and this ensures we both get an equal share without further delay.
